BB_BREAKOUT_UP signal with price breaking above upper Bollinger Band (4739.92)
High volatility regime (86.9%) supporting momentum continuation with mean-reverting properties

analysis.reasoning: Gold demonstrates an exceptionally powerful breakout continuation with today's action showing new highs at 4766.15 and breaking above the upper Bollinger Band. The technical structure remains extremely robust with price above all moving averages (EMA_BULL_STACK), strong momentum indicators (MACD bullish with positive histogram, ADX showing strong trend strength), and high volatility regime supporting continued momentum. Despite overbought conditions (RSI 75.49, Stochastic extreme), the breakout shows no signs of exhaustion. Cross-asset analysis reveals a strongly supportive risk-off environment with SPX showing breakdown signals (BB_BREAKOUT_DN, CCI_OS) and VIX breaking out higher, indicating increased market fear that typically benefits gold as a safe-haven asset. DXY weakness further supports gold's upward move. The combination of technical breakout strength and favorable cross-asset context confirms continuation of the BREAKOUT regime.
risk_factors: RSI extremely overbought at 75.49 suggests elevated near-term pullback risk
Stochastic extremely overbought (K:98.74, D:93.53) indicates potential momentum exhaustion
CCI extremely overbought at 168.81 suggests stretched momentum conditions
High volatility regime (86.9%) may lead to sharp reversals or increased price swings
VIX breakout to 20.08 indicates significant market stress that could affect all assets
Price breaking above upper Bollinger Band may face resistance and mean reversion pressure
